author: @adeel-waheed
text: Here is the brief summary:  1)--> Google Collab(Jupyter Notebook)   2)--> Installing dependencies (pypdf, transformers, einops, accelerate, langchain, bitsandbytes, sentence_transformers, llama_index)   3)--> Importing libraries (VectorStoreIndex, SimpleDirectoryReader, ServiceContext, HuggingFaceLLM, SimpleInputPrompt, torch)    4)--> Reading/Getting data (SimpleDirectoryreader)    5)--> Prompt templete(System Prompt, SystemInputPrompt)   6)--> HuggingFace login(user access token)   7)--> Calling/Fetching LLamA2 model from Huggingface(HuggingFaceLLM, meta-llama/Llama-2-7b-chat-hf)    8) --> Embeddings (HuggingFaceEmbeddings, LaingchainEmbeddings,  sentence-transformers/all-mpnet-base-v2)   9)--> Indexing/Querying LlamaIndex pipeline/application (Servicecontext, vectorstoreindex, query engine)
